note:
Very nice summertime wine with elegant residual sugar and nice balance.
Loaded with strawberry and red fruit with elegant creamy-like finish.
Really liked it.
tagged_note:

note: 3,8* very nice Rosé with residual sugar, friendly, creamy. Raspberry and strawberry.
tagged_note: 3,8* very nice Rosé with residual sugar, friendly, creamy. Raspberry and strawberry.

note: A subtle flower-flavoured wine with a hint of almond. Really enjoyable. No complex flavours, perfect for a calm evening after a calm day.
tagged_note: A subtle flower-flavoured wine with a hint of almond. Really enjoyable. No complex flavours, perfect for a calm evening after a calm day.

note: Nice. Candied fruits, peel, bubble gum.
tagged_note: Nice. Candied fruits, peel, bubble gum.

note: Fruits and roses, fresh, light and very “summer” a bit too sweet to me, but overall very enjoyable and pleasant. Indeed very good value for money.
tagged_note: Fruits and roses, fresh, light and very “summer” a bit too sweet to me, but overall very enjoyable and pleasant. Indeed very good value for money.

note: Clean, fruity delicious wine for a hot summers evening.
tagged_note: Clean, fruity delicious wine for a hot summers evening.

note: Nectarine, watermelon, melon, orange zest, 🍎 apple
tagged_note: Nectarine, watermelon, melon, orange zest, 🍎 apple

👀 Salmon
👃🏽 Summer fruit
